org.apache.ignite.ml.preprocessing.encoding

Class EncoderTrainer<K,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.ml.preprocessing.encoding.EncoderTrainer<K,V>
  • Type Parameters:
    K - Type of a key in upstream data.
    V - Type of a value in upstream data.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    PreprocessingTrainer<K,V>

    public class EncoderTrainer<K,V>
extends Object
implements PreprocessingTrainer<K,V>
    Trainer of the String Encoder and One-Hot Encoder preprocessors.

      • minCategorySize

        public EncoderTrainer<K,V> minCategorySize(Long minCategorySize)
        Sets the min category size for category target encoding. Category less then minCategorySize will be encoded with avarage target value.

        minCategorySize - min samples leaf.

        The changed trainer.
